message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me. What do you think?

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,800 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,200. This is a fair price considering the value the product holds for both of us. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,800 and $11,200. How about $11,000? I think this is a fair price for both of us.
